overview: This is the high resolution Blu-Ray format version of the Steven Wilson Grace for Drowning Release. It features the Album in hi resolution 5.1 stereo audio plus 2 bonus tracks, six work in progress demo versions and 5 promo videos.  Tracklist:  1. Grace for Drowning  2. Sectarian  3. Deform to Form a Star  4. No Part of Me  5. Postcard  6. Raider Prelude  7. Remainder the Black Dog  8. Belle De Jour  9. Index  10. Track One  11. Raider II  12. Like Dust I Have Cleared from My Eye
title: Steven Wilson: Grace for Drowning
